content: crochet a lovely black shawl in an openwork pattern with fun crochet ball trim 52 square dmc senso metallics size 3 100yrds/91m 1 20 oz/ 34g #1404 54 balls optional crochet ball trim - add 5 balls crochet hook us c/2 or d/3 3mm no gauge given optional clear 5/16 diameter glue on jewels - 95
